SELECT full_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';

SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.full_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.full_name, t.amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 500;
SELECT c.full_name AS customer_name, t.amount AS transaction_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT c.full_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, AVG(t.amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, MAX(t.amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, MIN(t.amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT c.full_name, DATE(t.transaction_date) AS date_only FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000);
SELECT c.full_name, c.email, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE c.address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount IS NULL;
SELECT full_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT c.full_name, AVG(t.amount) AS average_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name HAVING average_amount < 1000;
SELECT c.full_name, MAX(t.amount) AS max_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, MIN(t.amount) AS min_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name;
SELECT c.full_name, COUNT(t.amount) AS num_transactions FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount = (SELECT MAX(amount) FROM transactions);
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_date = (SELECT MAX(transaction_date) FROM transactions);
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transactions);
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = c.customer_id);
SELECT c.full_name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 100);
